questions.question: Has the user completed at least 10 transactions in the last 60 days?
Has the user owned at least 1 NFT continuously for the past 90 days?
questions.criteria: Evaluates NFT ownership data completeness over time

questions.question: Has the user conducted at least one DeFi interaction within the last 30 days?
questions.criteria: Checks recency of DeFi protocol usage

questions.question: Has the user consistently transacted with the same protocol at least 5 times in the past 30 days?
Does the user exhibit at least 3 transactions of similar value (±10%) in the last 30 days?
Is there wallet activity recorded on at least 20 distinct days within the last 90 days?
questions.criteria: Assesses data completeness and activity frequency
